mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "article" (title, content, author, publishdate, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{publishdate}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "article" WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
SELECT * FROM "article" WHERE publishdate BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = COALESCE(#{title}, title), content = COALESCE(#{content}, content), author = COALESCE(#{author}, author), publishdate = COALESCE(#{publishdate}, publishdate), created_at = COALESCE(#{createdAt}, created_at), updated_at = COALESCE(#{updatedAt}, updated_at) WHERE id = #{id}
